deny: // Secrets and credentials - never allow Claude Code to read these
// Destructive operations - prevent accidental data loss
// System modifications - prevent container escape attempts
// Network security - prevent unauthorized external access
ask: // Network operations - always ask before making external requests
// Package management - confirm before installing dependencies
// Git operations - confirm before pushing or destructive operations

hooks.command: jq -r '.session_id + "|" + .transcript_path' | while IFS='|' read -r sid tpath; do reason=$(jq -r 'map(select(.type == "assistant")) | last | .message.stopReason // "unknown"' "$tpath" 2>/dev/null || echo "unknown"); mkdir -p ~/.claude/audit && echo "$(date): Session $sid ended - reason: $reason" >> ~/.claude/audit/claude-sessions.log; done

jq -r '[.tool_name, (.tool_input.command // .tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.pattern // .tool_input.url // .tool_input.query // .tool_input.description // .tool_input.skill // "N/A")] | @tsv' | while read tool detail; do mkdir -p ~/.claude/audit && echo "$(date): [$tool] $detail" >> ~/.claude/audit/audit.log; done
jq -r '.prompt // empty' | while read -r msg; do mkdir -p ~/.claude/audit && echo "$(date): [USER] $msg" >> ~/.claude/audit/audit.log; done
